response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Team Leadership | Management | Customer Experience Specialist
response.summary: Dynamic and detail-oriented Engineer with a solid background in operations management and customer service. Possesses a strong understanding of contact center operations, process improvement strategies, and quality assurance methodologies. Excels in driving operational efficiency, optimizing workflows, and ensuring seamless customer experiences. A proactive leader who thrives in fast-paced environments and effectively collaborates with cross-functional teams to achieve organizational goals. Seeking a challenging position where I can utilize my technical expertise, leadership abilities, and strategic thinking to contribute to organizational success.
response.skills: Troubleshooting, Customer Support, Banking, Customer Relations, Action Plan Development, Strategy, Active Listening, Time Management, Mentoring, Key Performance Indicators, Data Analysis, Decision-Making, Client Relations, Soft Skills, Bilingual Communications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Operations Management, Team Leadership, Problem Solving, Easily Adaptable

profile_positions.description:
- Successfully managed day-to-day operations of a high-volume contact center, overseeing a team of 120 agents and supervisors.
- Developed and executed strategies to enhance customer service quality, resulting in increased customer satisfaction scores and improved Net Promoter Score (NPS).
-Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve operational issues, ensuring a seamless customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Supervise and motivate a team of call center agents, ensuring adherence to company policies and procedures.
- Set performance goals, monitor performance metrics, and provide regular feedback to team members.
- Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to identify areas for improvement and implement action plans.
- Conduct regular team meetings to communicate updates, changes, and share best practices.
profile_positions.title: Operations Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Provide courteous and professional assistance to customers who contact the call center via phone in English for a financial institution in the US. 
- Address customer concerns, complaints, and questions effectively, aiming to resolve their issues during the initial contact whenever possible.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative

profile_positions.description: - Provide assistance to customers over the phone by giving solutions to problems related to technical issues with internet, phone, and television services (bilingual).
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Representative

profile_positions.description: - Development of customer service abilities in new agents in the operation through feedback sessions.
profile_positions.title: Operations Check Point Mentor

company.name: Atento Colombia
company.description: Atento inició operaciones en Colombia en el año 2000 y hoy somos líderes en nuestro segmento en el país.
